snippet: AMC has filled its Saturday schedule with classic western movies and cowboy TV shows, and has high hopes for “Hell on Wheels.”
abstract: AMC will move well-established western series Hell on Wheels to Saturday night spot, part of effort to cater original content to male audience on that evening; move reverses usual strategy of moving unpopular content to Saturdays.
lead_paragraph: AMC has filled its Saturday schedule with classic western movies and cowboy TV shows, and has high hopes for “Hell on Wheels.”

headline.seo: AMC Shifts ‘Hell on Wheels’ to Saturdays, With High Hopes
headline.main: AMC Shifts a Series to Saturdays, but Not to Kill It
headline.print_headline: AMC Shifts a Series to Saturdays, but Not to Kill It
